name: Super BoxMan Ultra (itch)
description:
Super BoxMan Ultra is a classic Sokoban puzzle game where you play as worker in a warehouse, your job is to position the boxes at the designated locations to complete the level, the tricky part is only one box may be pushed at a time, and boxes cannot be pulled.

Features
  • 72 levels
  • Colourful graphics
  • Undo feature (undo your moves to correct mistakes)
  • Music and Display settings
  • 4k support
  • Windows and MAC
